snippet: Kelly Evans, who became a video star at The Wall Street Journal, is moving to the television network CNBC.
abstract: Kelly Evans, who became a video star at The Wall Street Journal, is moving to the television network CNBC.
lead_paragraph: Kelly Evans, who became a video star at a place not known for that sort of thing, The Wall Street Journal, is moving to the television network CNBC.

headline.main: Wall Street Journal Co-Anchor to Move to CNBC
